explains: n. 摄影，摄影术；摄影影像，摄影图片

fashion photography 时装摄影；样式摄影术
color photography 彩色摄影；彩色相片；彩色照相术

sentences.en: Photography is one of her hobbies.
Her hobbies include hiking and photography.
sentences.cn: 她的业余爱好包括徒步旅行和摄影。

sentences.en: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.cn: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。
